message.name: INF_CREATE_USERNAME_EMAIL_SUBJECT
message.locale: Spain, Universal Access Account Login Details

message.name: INF_CREATE_USERNAME_EMAIL_CONTENT
message.locale:
Dear %1s,

A Universal Access Account has been created for you. Your log in details are outlined below. We advise that you change your password the next time you log in to your account by choosing the ‘Reset Password’ option within your account.

Your user name is: %2s
Your password is: %3s

Yours Sincerely,
%4s

Spain, Dear %1s,

A Universal Access Account has been created for you. Your log in details are outlined below. We advise that you change your password the next time you log in to your account by choosing the ‘Reset Password’ option within your account.

Your user name is: %2s
Your password is: %3s

Yours Sincerely,
%4s
